definitions.definition: The extent to which time is well used for the intended task.
definitions.example: The efficiency of the planning department is deplorable.

definitions.definition: The quality of producing an effect or effects.
The extent to which a resource, such as electricity, is used for the intended purpose; the ratio of useful work to energy expended.
definitions.example: The efficiency of this loudspeaker is 40%.
I have an efficiency available June through July.
